snippet: The microwave oven has acquired a reputation as a mere popcorn popper and leftover heater-upper. But it can do so much more.
abstract: Microwave ovens have acquired reputation as mere popcorn poppers and leftover heater-uppers but they can do much more;  game-changing new uses are featured in chapter of Modernist Cuisine At Home cookbook, such as recipe for microwaved black cod.
lead_paragraph: The microwave oven has acquired a reputation as a mere popcorn popper and leftover heater-upper. But it can do so much more.
